title: Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       The images in our Photo and Multimedia Section represent a small cross-section of our collection of over 66,000 photographic prints. Many of these images relate to the work of the Olmsted firm, but some were of the Olmsted family and their life here at Fairsted. Over the next few months we will be adding both these historic images as well as images of contemporary programs and events both here at Olmsted NHS and out in the community. Digitizing the approximately 140,000 plans and drawings, 66,000 photographs and thousands of office documents is an ongoing process. If you're interested in scrolling through. visit our Flickr site for a greater look into our archival collection.   Â     Photographer D.W. Butterfield taking a view of Refectory Hill in Franklin Park, 1892. Courtesy of National Park Service, Frederick Law Olmsted NHS
